channel.title: Assembly on Portfolio - Preston Locke
channel.description: Recent content in Assembly on Portfolio - Preston Locke

item.title: CPUID
item.description: I started this project after becoming curious how hardware detection tools like CPU-Z work. When I looked up the developers of the software, CPUID, I learned that their namesake was also the name of an Assembly instruction that returns info about a machine’s CPU! Since my Computer Systems Organization class taught me about the inner workings of a processor and how Assembly code works, I really wanted to see if I could write my own code to utilize the CPUID instruction.
